Package project.capstone.Controller

Class UsersController

java.lang.Object
project.capstone.Controller.UsersController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/users") @CrossOrigin public class UsersController extends Object
Controller class for managing operations related to users.

    • addNewUser

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO> addNewUser(@RequestBody project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO usersDTO)
      Endpoint to add a new user.
      Parameters:
      usersDTO - The UsersDTO object representing the user to add.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added UsersDTO with HTTP status CREATED.

    • addAdmin

      @PostMapping("/admin") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO> addAdmin(@RequestBody project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO usersDTO)
      Endpoint to add a new admin user.
      Parameters:
      usersDTO - The UsersDTO object representing the admin user to add.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added admin UsersDTO with HTTP status CREATED.

      Endpoint to retrieve all users.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of UsersDTOs with HTTP status OK.

    • viewUser

      @GetMapping("/view/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO> viewUser(@PathVariable("id") String userId)
      Endpoint to view a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the UsersDTO of the requested user with HTTP status OK.

    • viewUserByMail

      @GetMapping("/view/username/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO> viewUserByMail(@PathVariable("id") String userId)
      Endpoint to view a user by their email (username).
      Parameters:
      userId - The email (username) of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the UsersDTO of the requested user with HTTP status OK.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUser(@PathVariable("id") String userId)
      Endpoint to delete a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message and HTTP status OK.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/update/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO> updateUser(@PathVariable("id") String userId, @RequestBody project.capstone.DTO.UsersDTO usersDTO)
      Endpoint to update a user's information by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to update.
